children.subject:
Hey OP, not that this helps but I was going to take CS 61C with CS 169A over the summer then I realized how much work CS 61C workload is even over the regular semester and decided against doing so. This is what I found out about summer CS 61C:

- 2 labs per week (CS 61C labs are super long and you might spend time outside of lab to complete them)
- 2 homeworks per week (very long ones) if there's no project OR 1 homework and a PROJECT 
- Midterm 1 on week 3, Midterm 2 on week 5 or 6, and the final exam on week 8

Basically, you might have hell weeks (plenty of them actually) like so:
- 2 labs, a homework or 2 and a project due in the same week
- 1 lab, a homework, a lab, and a midterm
- 1 lab, a homework and a final. 
- 2 labs and 2 homeworks

This is data that I just got from the summer 2018 CS61C schedule. CS61C is very intense. Something like Data 100 & CS 188 might work but CS61C with any other technical class will be hell but who am I to scare you from doing so? If you believe you can do it, then by all means do it like a true Berkeley student.

history.content: I plan on doing both, or taking one and dropping the other. Curious about how others who have done this feel abt it.  To add some context, I took CS70 (in-person) last summer and thought it was very manageable.
history.subject: CS 61C & 188 workload over summer
